entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
